form.isTransportWeightCompliant: Is Transport Weight and Dimensions Compliant?

placeholder.fullName: Last Name First Name Middle Name

cargoShipmentStartCountry.required: Cargo shipment start country is required

cargoShipmentEndCountry.required: Cargo shipment end country is required

isTransportWithCargo.required: Please select whether transport is with cargo or not

isTransportAsGoods.required: Please select whether transport is as goods or not

isCargoReloadedToAnotherTransport.required: Please select whether cargo will be reloaded to another transport or not

isCargoAlreadyDeclared.required: Please select whether cargo was already declared or not

help.transportType: Select the type of transport used for cargo shipment (road, railway, air, sea).
help.senderCustomsPost: Specify the customs post through which the cargo is dispatched.
help.cargoShipmentStartCountry: Select the country where cargo shipment begins.
help.cargoShipmentEndCountry: Select the country where cargo shipment ends.
help.isTransportWithCargo: Indicate whether the vehicle is loaded with cargo or empty.
help.isTransportAsGoods: Indicate whether the vehicle itself is goods for sale.
help.isTransportWeightCompliant: Confirm that the vehicle's weight and dimensions comply with established standards.
help.isTransportWindowTinted: Indicate whether the vehicle's windows are tinted.
help.isCargoReloadedToAnotherTransport: Indicate whether the cargo will be reloaded to another vehicle en route.
help.isCargoAlreadyDeclared: Indicate whether a customs declaration was previously issued for the cargo.
help.declarantType: Select who is filling out the declaration: vehicle owner (carrier) or driver.
help.entityType: Select the entity type: legal entity or individual person.
help.carrierEntityType: Indicate whether the carrier is a legal entity or an individual person.
help.carrierFullName: Enter the full last name, first name and middle name of the carrier.
help.carrierCitizenship: Select the country of citizenship of the carrier.
help.carrierTin: Enter the carrier's PIN (Personal Identification Number) or TIN (Tax Identification Number).
help.carrierPhone: Enter the phone number to contact the carrier.
help.carrierPassportSeries: Enter the carrier's passport series and number.
help.vehicleRegistrationNumber: Enter the state registration number of the vehicle.
help.vehicleBrand: Enter the vehicle brand (e.g.: MAN, Mercedes, Volvo).
help.vehicleYear: Enter the year the vehicle was manufactured (4-digit format).
help.vehicleRegistrationCountry: Select the country of vehicle registration.
help.trailerRegistrationNumber: If there is a trailer, enter its registration number.
help.trailerRegistrationCountry: If there is a trailer, select the country of its registration.
help.driverEntityType: Indicate whether the driver is a legal entity or an individual person.
help.driverFullName: Enter the full last name, first name and middle name of the driver.
help.driverCitizenship: Select the country of citizenship of the driver.
help.driverTin: Enter the driver's PIN (Personal Identification Number) or TIN (Tax Identification Number).
help.driverPhone: Enter the phone number to contact the driver.
help.driverPassportSeries: Enter the driver's passport series and number.
help.brokerTin: Enter the broker company's TIN (Tax Identification Number). Must consist of 9 digits.
help.brokerCompanyName: Enter the full name of the broker company.
help.brokerAddress: Enter the address of the broker company (MFY, street, house number).

vehicleLicenseUpload.title: Upload Vehicle License
vehicleLicenseUpload.description: Upload an image or scan of the vehicle registration certificate (technical passport).

declarationForm.title: Cargo Customs Declaration
declarationForm.declarationNumberInfo: Unique number of the customs declaration assigned upon registration
declarationForm.exporterNameInfo: Full legal name of the exporter company
declarationForm.exporterAddressInfo: Actual address of the exporter company
declarationForm.exporterCountryInfo: Country of dispatch of goods (code according to countries classifier)
declarationForm.exporterAdditionalInfoInfo: Additional information about the exporter (TIN, OKPO and other details)
declarationForm.sendButtonInfo: Send customs value declaration to customs values register
declarationForm.deleteButtonInfo: Remove customs declaration from customs values register
